story:
When you tend to work continuously for hours in front of a computer screen, the monitor light bar is an ideal choice, especially when you read a lot of text. For gamers, it is also beneficial to provide sufficient lighting without causing eye strain.Introducing Elesense, the asymmetrical design computer monitor light bar that minimizes screen glare, featuring auto dimming, wireless remote control and sturdy metal body. Additionally, the universal clamp makes it fit any shape of monitor. Being USB powered, it is the clean and minimal method to add additional desk lighting without the clutter.

Staring at a bright screen in a dark room can increase strain on your eyes. Thanks to the customized asymmetrical optical design, Elesense monitor light bar brightens your space for easier reading without causing any screen refection. 

The asymmetrical light effectively prevents eye fatigue to ensure that you work for extended hours. It brings back comfort and greatly relieves eye strain while providing sufficient professional lighting over regular lamps.

Brighten your workspace for easier reading without boosting the brightness of the screen, which can be taxing on your eyes. 

Elesense monitor light bar utilizes anodized aluminum alloy to secure the outstanding property. It fits for flat monitors as well as thicker, curvy-shaped (curved with 1800R and above) monitors. The holder of the monitor lamp works with a counterweight, making it easy to attach on any monitor with thickness between 0.7~4.5 cm (0.2~1.7 inch). The lamp itself holds thanks to magnets with gold contacts on the holder.

The below images demonstrates how Elesense works on top of the 1800R curvy monitor, and multiple screens. It perfectly suits any kind or any style of this monitor or workspace with multiple monitors.

With three lighting modes, including Precision, Reading, and Relaxing, and countless color temperature and brightness adjustment via a total of 90 dual-color LEDs (45 cool, 45 warm), Elesense boasts an extremely nice solution for bright, flexible and thoughtful “spread” of light on your desktop work area.

  • Precision Mode: Color temperature 5000k; brightness automatically supplemented to 500 lux according to ambient light.
  • Reading Mode: Color temperature 4200k; brightness automatically supplemented to 500 lux
  • Relaxing Mode: Color temperature 3000k; brightness automatically supplemented to 300 lux

Its variable brightness and color temperature settings got you covered in numerous occasions. You may adjust to meet different lighting needs. The color temperature ranges from 2700k to 6500k, offering the options for e-readers to choose warm light for relaxing whereas cool light for efficiency and concentration. Enjoy the infinite levels of control you get with the remote.

No flicker: There is no flicker happening when you shoot videos with mobile phones.

In addition to directional lighting, Elesense solves the problem of "visual glare".

Screen lights are usually hung on the top of the display. When the light source is higher than your horizontal line of sight, you're more likely to look directly at the lamp beads, which may cause glare and eye fatigue. When designing directional lighting, we strive to solve this problem.

Elesense shows objects in full, natural color with above Ra95 value color rendering index (CRI). It has achieved one of the highest general color rendering index up to date, which tells how true, and how close a light is to sunlight.

As soon as it reveals true natural color and details, it reduces eye fatigue, making it more convenient for designers as well as post editors to work from long-term use.

The Elesense system has built-in ambient light sensor, which adjusts the intensity of the light bar LEDs accordingly and automatically, maintaining 500 lux of light in the area. It can be manually dimmable via the wireless remote control as well. The auto dimming feature is pretty practical and time saving, since you don’t have to adjust the brightness level each time before you start the work.

The auto dimming function will not continuously sense the ambient lighting, so it requires the user to tap the “Auto” button when the ambient light is changed. But thanks to its memory function which can remember the brightness and color temperature for next time direct application.

Traditional monitor light bars are usually built with a cable controller, which is unfriendly for desk organizers, for instance, if you want to keep the cables hidden behind the screen but that makes it difficult to access the controller. Elesense comes with a 2.4Ghz wireless remote control so that you can change the brightness, color temperature, modes without having to walk over. It makes settings changing much easier. More importantly, your desktop will maintain clean and minimal as it used to be. The remote offers infinite stops for extremely smooth control experience! 

You can choose to use a dynamic setting, switching among the Precision, Reading and Relaxing modes, press and rotate clockwise/anti-clockwise to increase/decrease bright level and color temperature. There is even uber cool feature to sync up another Elesense monitor light with the current one.

If you are a dual monitor user, you will also be able to control multiple light beams at the same time through one single 2.4G controller. Press and hold the light button on the controller for 3 seconds to pair the beams. And then it enters the multi-light control mode.

Elesense design team think the clamp system is significant since uses have monitors of different shapes and designs. Your display is the critical factor on whether it will even be attached properly. To provide the clamp with great compatibility, we use one-piece zinc alloy counterweight clamp to ensure the light bar stay solid in the place, given a variety of monitors from thin screens, thick curvy shaped ones, to square edged displays.

It fits any monitor with thickness from 0.2” to 1.7” (0.7 to 4.5 cm). Holding your display securely, it won’t damage your screen like others.

No bulky base like the lamp. Only clean and minimal design that attaches to the clamp through magnetic connectors. Using USB C connector for power, Elesense removes all hassles and clutters, hangs over your computer to offer a nice, comfortable light on your keyboard and desktop work area.

When you need to change the settings, you may simply tap on the visualized remote control with LED sensor light, to have Auto lighting or customized lighting setting. No extra wires. Comfortable user experience. Elesense is the best accompanying partner throughout most of your work/gaming time.

Materials are one of the key factors during the product polishing process. Now we are very proud to say that Elesense is one of the best built monitor light bars. It can even be comparable to the products of well-known international brands.

The main body surface treatment of the light bar is anodized sandblasting for prolong durability and stylish aesthetics. The touch control dial is made of tempered glass, disc shape side construction is extremely solid as well as it is built from aluminium alloy. We are pretty sure it matches your style if you look into modern high tech or cool desktop. The visual indication provided by the LED lit control panel makes it intuitive and fairly easy to use.

Other parts including the bottom of the dial is made of skin friendly soft plastic, offering nice touch and feel. Besides the one-piece study zinc alloy counterweight system, it also has very thoughtful design: it has built with soft rubber with the clamp to avoid scratches on your display. You can rest assure that it mounts very well and won’t damage your monitor. 

 

We've been focused on making lights for many years. We've tried almost every monitor light for the past years, but none of them is satisfying. We want a monitor light bar that is easy to start, comfortable to use no matter work, visual design, gaming, coding or surfing on the Internet. It should look great and offer smooth user interactive experience. 

And we start the design of Elesense. We wish we could listen to the Kickstarter community's voices to incubate new product ideas. Thank you!

And then it enters the multi-light control mode.Elesense design team think the clamp system is significant since uses have monitors of different shapes and designs. Your display is the critical factor on whether it will even be attached properly. To provide the clamp with great compatibility, we use one-piece zinc alloy counterweight clamp to ensure the light bar stay solid in the place, given a variety of monitors from thin screens, thick curvy shaped ones, to square edged displays.It fits any monitor with thickness from 0.2” to 1.7” (0.7 to 4.5 cm). Holding your display securely, it won’t damage your screen like others.No bulky base like the lamp. Only clean and minimal design that attaches to the clamp through magnetic connectors. Using USB C connector for power, Elesense removes all hassles and clutters, hangs over your computer to offer a nice, comfortable light on your keyboard and desktop work area.When you need to change the settings, you may simply tap on the visualized remote control with LED sensor light, to have Auto lighting or customized lighting setting. No extra wires. Comfortable user experience. Elesense is the best accompanying partner throughout most of your work/gaming time.Materials are one of the key factors during the product polishing process. Now we are very proud to say that Elesense is one of the best built monitor light bars. It can even be comparable to the products of well-known international brands.The main body surface treatment of the light bar is anodized sandblasting for prolong durability and stylish aesthetics. The touch control dial is made of tempered glass, disc shape side construction is extremely solid as well as it is built from aluminium alloy. We are pretty sure it matches your style if you look into modern high tech or cool desktop. The visual indication provided by the LED lit control panel makes it intuitive and fairly easy to use.Other parts including the bottom of the dial is made of skin friendly soft plastic, offering nice touch and feel. Besides the one-piece study zinc alloy counterweight system, it also has very thoughtful design: it has built with soft rubber with the clamp to avoid scratches on your display. You can rest assure that it mounts very well and won’t damage your monitor.  We've been focused on making lights for many years. We've tried almost every monitor light for the past years, but none of them is satisfying. We want a monitor light bar that is easy to start, comfortable to use no matter work, visual design, gaming, coding or surfing on the Internet. It should look great and offer smooth user interactive experience. And we start the design of Elesense. We wish we could listen to the Kickstarter community's voices to incubate new product ideas. Thank you!

story:
What is Mover Erase Combo? 

A Greener Alternative of Sticky Notes, in Smaller Sizes to Break ideas down

 

 Do you feel like Mover Erase from our last campaign is insufficient to break ideas down? And at the same time disliking paper versions?

Mover Erase Combo, a new version, is here to upgrade your user experience!

It is the new endeavor to apply the concept of Mover Erase onto “bricking ideas down” with different sizes. With new organizer too! Play the below video to learn more!

The Combination of post-it and whiteboard

Patented Magnetic Feature for Easy Picking-up

Mover Erase Combo Street-sign feature for your idea to stand out from your mind map.

 

Arrange and Snap tasks aside monitor

 

Single out a task to focus

Workspace at your command

Use Mover Erase Combo to save paper!

 

 

 

Our tools and system form our habit. Our habits affect our planet development. The way we used for a long time doesn't mean there is no room for improvement. It's high time for choosing a greener and more meaningful one.

Compared to sticky notes, Mover Erase is a better solution to save attention, money and the planet.

Wipe off and resuse.

Wipe off and reuse

We all have our role to protect our planet!

Use Mover Erase Combo to save paper!

 

Form a new habit to save paper~

Focus on One Thing at a Time

Easy Picking-up

Easy pick up even when they are closely surrounded

 

Ideas Grouping and Easy Moving

 

Mover Erase system can save our brain energy when we are solving problem and making decision.

 

Bring your body to your work.

We make many decisions everyday. Visualize and feel them help you choose faster!

 

Do things one by one. Too many things occupying our brain is a problem. We should not open too many drawers in our head at the same time.

 

Collide ideas by hands and let the combination surprise you!

Memo falling off could be a mess.

Organize workdesk neatly!

Messy writing and flipping pages can distort our thinking sometimes.

With Mover Erase Combo, processing ideas can be at-a-glance.

 

 

If you have too many works on hand, it can be hard to decide what to focus on. The hardest thing is that everything looks important and they occupy our brain all at once. It can be energy draining.

 

That's why multi-tasking will negatively affect you emotionally and get you stressful.

 

Prioritize your work and block your time everyday is a good solution to be productive. If you don't save your attention, the world will steal it from you. Schedule your attention.

 

Prioritize tasks brick by brick

Credit to Supawut5

Er have interviewed and exchanged ideas with different people. And they support us with suggested templates! Does this template look useful to you?

Use your hands to adjust your strategy and planning

 

Aren't we stimulated the most when we move things by hand? Experience it once more!

 

Really block your time brick by brick.

Different sizes of Mover Erase represent hours interval

Color code and at a glance prioritizing

 

You know what you need to do just by skimming.

 

E.g.

 

Yellow = To do/ do it by yourself

 

Green = appointment/Meeting

 

White = thinking

Wipe off the tasks when finished. A system urges you to keep core things but not everything. Keep your console minimal and clean. Isolate only important things in your own sight.

 

Jot down on Mover Erase Combo, think, feel, rearrange, break down into small tasks and focus on action.

 

Use your hands to turn on your head.

 

 

 

so what's new

During our 2nd campaign, "Mover Erase - Mini Whiteboard on the Palm", our community asked for an upgrade of the 1st gen Mover with Erasable surface.

 

This campaign is the upgrade of 1st campaign tools injected with the eco-friendly ideology from the 2nd campaign.

 

The process involves the experience of manufacturing a new found material from the second campaign and applying it to change and upgrade the 1st gen Movers.

 

it looks like a small change, though it is a response to the voice of the community.

 

 

 

In our first campaign, the sizes of Mover were praised by backers. They believe those are the perfect sizes for breaking ideas down and blocking the time. Arranging works could be more meticulous and it would be easy to separate different ideas.


Although writing on memo paper still has its value, some backers felt that refilling mover was a shortcoming as the product was still in early stages. They worry refills are not immediately available. Erasable surface was needed.


For our second campaign, we originally would like to turn all 1st gen product erasable. However, mass producing small sizes of silicon material was a challenge. New installation method has to be tested and discovered. That is why the size in the second campaign is much larger than the first campaign and only comes in a single size.

Small sizes of silicon mass production Failure during initial second campaign planning.

After the 2nd campaign’s success. We have accumulated the manufacturing experience and mastered it. In this campaign. we have utter confidence to apply new found material to complete the product development process in response to the backers in the 2nd campaign. Also, there has been an improvement for the coating technique based on the 2nd campaign’s writing material to produce the 3rd campaign’s rewards.

The improvement of coating technique enhances the erasable experience and solve the stain problem. The silicon whiteboard material’s stability and polymerization is enhanced.

 

 

We have not settled for simply turning the 1st gen Movers into erasable surfaces, we have taken an extra step. 


To embody the idea of “using Mover Erase everywhere”, we have invited a new organizer to the family, The MoverPanel.


MoverPanel is a light weight, versatile organizer with magnetic feature which can store Mover Erase Combo. At the same time, its back is embedded with micro-suction technology with silicon, thus making it rewashable and re-stickable.

The Components of Mover Panel

Extra Thin Matt Black Metallic Sheet Installation

Template changing feature

Mover Erase Combo snapped on Mover Panel

Washable silicon adhesive surface

 

For our 1st campaign, there wasn’t any voting or involvment of color design for Movers. For the 2nd campaign, the color was set to only White by default.

In this campaign, there will be 2 extra colors on top of “white” right off the bat. Those two colors were the 2 favoritely voted colors from the last campaign. After stretch goals are met, we are excited welcome more colors to the Mover family!


We can’t wait for more ideas from the community, whether they are on templates, advancement of usage, new organizers need. etc.

 

 

1 pack has 1 single color.

 

Organizers:

Different organizers for Mover Erase Combo can suit different needs.


Backers can add the organizers they want during the backer survey period, which will be sent after pledging on Indiegogo.

 

 

Stick ideas on the wall with Mover Panel

Mover Panel on Glass

Sticking Mover Panel anywhere

Silicon material for washing and re-sticking

Mover Panel change of templates

Snap ideas aside monitor for always-in-sight reminder.

Easy adjustment for sudden change of agenda

MoverPad Template Changing Feature

Snap MoverPad on the Fridge.

 

A central thinking place for ideas!

Magnetic snap on Fridge/ Whiteboard!

Template Changing! (Downloadable on Website)

Visit our website to download or share your design to our community!

Large surface for moving ideas!

Smoothly transitioning ideas!

Hang on the wall for decoration (and notes for housework)

U Shape design at the bottom to reside small items.

 

All whiteboard markers can be used on Mover Erase Combo.


After our last campaign, we have received many backers' feedback and Expo Ultra Fine Tip is by far the best type of pen to write on Mover Erase as it has a small tip. We recommend it if you want a small tip whiteboard marker.

(It is also easy to obtain from Amazon)

Here is the demonstration of using Expo Ultra Fine Tip on different sizes of Mover Erase the Combo comes with.

Writings on the S, M, L and XL size.

Erasing Demonstration

Demonstration on marker pen eraser

This time, Mover Erase Combo has an improvement of organization as it can be stacked neatly for different sizes, which was absent from past campaign. The paper in past versions have hindered for such a feature. And the upgraded versions with the silicon whiteboard material helps forge it. 

The improved version is more neatly stacked.

 

Many backers expressed that they had similar ideas when Mover debuted.

After they received movers, they are happily using them.

And this campaign is also the response to many backers after the last campaign.

We have finalized our design and are ready to manufacture.


During the prototyping period, we have built a strong connection with our suppliers and excluded the bad ones.


We have done a lot of testing on prototype and tooling process to ensure the manufacturing and production process will be feasible and smooth.


If we can pull this off, with our 1st and 2nd campaigns’ successful experience, we have utter confidence to deliver what you ordered with high quality.  Taken the pandemic situation into consideration, we are estimating 5-6 months until final delivery, which should be October to November 2021.

Risks and challenges

We have accumulated a lot of knowledge and experience to develop Mover Erase Combo. Furthermore, we have the experience of the last two successfully funded campaigns.  Our team has put in a great deal of effort into this project and we are confident that with a successful backing, we will be able to successfully complete our campaign.  We know how important communication is and we pledge to be open and transparent with you to the best of our abilities. If we are met with unexpected circumstances, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner. It is important to note that we ship the products to a wide-range of certain countries and there may be some delays due to taxes, tariffs and other import regulation in each country.  Mover Erase Combo is a consumable product and we will try our best to keep the quality at its best. Although it is a very rare scenario, if the products fall off too many times, there is a potential for the magnets to drop out from the mover erase combo. There will not be refund nor return process. Users are advised to find ways to restore the product.

story:
Work uninterrupted and boost your productivity with the BusyBox™ wireless status sign. Choose the best message to let everyone in your house know to not bother you. With just a click on the app, immediately create an interruption-free zone for as long as you need.

BusyBox comes in two models: BusyBox D is the digital version which allows you to create any message or image on an LCD screen, and BusyBox S is the slide-in sign version that can last all week on a single charge.

Create your own message to express your own mood. The BusyBox D has a crisp digital screen for custom messages that communicate your current status.

With BusyBox S you simply slide in your message, choose a color, brightness and blinking mode from the app to tell anyone in your home "please don't bother me."

Let your house-mates know when you're busy without having to utter a single word. Place your BusyBox anywhere to remind others to not disturb.

Whether you’re working remotely, jumping on video calls, streaming videos, recording a podcast, studying for finals, aiming for the crown in PUBG, or just in need of some solo time, BusyBox gets you the uninterrupted space you need.

 

BusyBox comes with a free app that lets you easily turn it on and off, select different background colors, and set light behavior modes, like blinking or fading, if desired.

BusyBox will also integrate with many apps, for more “hands-free” control. Use voice command assistants like Siri and Google Assistant to control BusyBox.

You can also sync it with apps like Google Calendar (among others) for full automation.

Let everyone in your house know when “now is not a good time” without touching a thing!


You can also easily turn BusyBox on and off through the intuitive button on the side of the cover. As you get ready to seclude yourself, just tap the button on the BusyBox as you walk in and close the door.

Choose from an assortment of cover designs! Complete your BusyBox customization by choosing the perfect cover color and design to match your style and decor. All covers are compatible with both BusyBox D and BusyBox S

 

 

 

BusyBox is completely wireless. The rechargeable battery in the BusyBox S can last for more than 120 hours, and 10+ hours on the BusyBox D. Both fully recharge in a few hours. Just plug it in at the end of the week or overnight, and it’ll be ready to go.

The digital model gives you greater control of the message with the cost of a shorter battery life. To make up for it, it uses a larger battery to maximize the “on” time, so you can display updates all day long and recharge at night or every other night.

 

BusyBox boasts a simple and clean aesthetic — no disorderly designs, clunky features, or unsightly wires. Easily fit it in any style of home without obtrusion.

From work to school to entertainment, our world is quickly shifting to remote processes and home offices. We need to draw the line between personal life and professional life now more than ever. With BusyBox, you can — with a click of a button, tap on your phone, or request from Siri.

You will get the standard message set, but you can add additional message sets during checkout. 

February 2021 UPDATE: ------------------------------

Shipping starts.  Woot!

THANK YOU TO ALL OUR BACKERS!!!

Product inspection from the first production run at Steve's house turned test lab.

 

Factory testing of the software and firmware.

BACK TO DATA ABOUT THE PRODUCT: ---------------------------

 

Size of both BusyBox Standard and BusyBox Digital.

BusyBox Control App: Free on iOS and Android

The team behind BusyBox is a unique group of friends and colleagues.  We’ve all had very different paths to get to here, but we’re all very similar in our desire to make cool products that are built well, with high quality engineering.  Best of all, we like we do and we like who we do it with.

We’ve worked with (and for) some of the world’s best companies and we enjoy creating products.  We’ve built some pretty crazy tech too … from high powered audio systems, to high-sensitivity vibration analysis products, a social network for musicians with 20M users, even an OTA app controllable switching system (ping us if you like to discuss 24 bit audio sampling to compound with impulse response optimization). We are makers.

story:
Introducing ThunderGo, the most compact and powerful 200W GaN charger. With a trio of  USB-C ports and a USB-A port, this is your best go-to charger.

 

Tired of tangled cables? Frustrated with having not enough power? ThunderGo is your best solution!

 

 

Featuring 3 USB-C and 1 USB-A Ports, ThunderGo is the best GaN charger there is on the market, which allows you to simultaneously charge 4 devices at full speed!

Have you ever found yourself in the situation where you are desperate to find an adaptor in a foreign country? We got that figured out for you! We offered a set of global pin converters that you can use anywhere in the world. Stay charged has never been easier

 

When it comes to charging, it’s all about safety first! You don’t want to short circuit your devices or even start a fire. ThunderGo is ETL, FC, CE & RoHs certified, which gives absolute safety against overcharging, overcurrent, short circuiting and overheated

You might have a hard time finding the right charger for your Apple devices, well you don’t have to search for it anymore. ThunderGo is your all-time fit for any Apple devices including iPhone, Macbook, iPad or Airpods!

With ThunderGo, save up to 100 USD! Pay less, bring less, charge more!

 

With 2 x 100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 PPS ports, a single 200W ThunderGo charger can charge 2 laptops (16" MacBook Pro) simultaneously, and at full speed. This is a gamechanger in charger technology, making it the one of the first compact chargers around the globe to output 200W.

 

The USB-A port of ThunderGo Charger is compatible with a wide range of devices that support Quick Charge 3.0, AFC, SCP, FCP almost all major fast charging protocols in the market from all major brands including Samsung, Huawei, Oppo, Vivo and Oneplus up to 30W.

Weighing just 320g, this is easily one of the most compact devices out there, slip it into your pocket and travel light! No more bulky chargers and messy cables!

 

ThunderGo is literally just the size of a credit card, making it one of the smallest yet powerful charger that satisfies all your charging needs.

 

Having a hard time finding your laptop charging port? You don’t have to worry about that anymore as we have included the option for a kit of a variety of different laptop ports! ThunderGo is the last charger you need!

We have also provided a 130W version of GaN charger for you!

We are a young and passionate team focused on fast charging devices; original and innovative product manufacturing. And we strive to establish new standards for related products in the market. Every gadget is well produced as an "intelligent, quality, original and hign-end" one. 
Our aim is to bring an efficient way of life to people.

We partnered with VINA to make this incredible product for you!

About us
Pioneer Products of Charger Intelligent Life
Ever since its founding in 2009, VINA International Holdings Ltd has devoted strenuos efforts to establish an one-stop manufacture chain including product model, assemble, plastic injection molding and research. Based on the principle of "convenient your life", which stands for original company, aiming at arouse your desire for smart products.

Best Product Ever
"We want to do the best products ever." This is what VINA International Holdings Ltd always keeps in mind. We stick to original, innovate product manufacturing, strive to establish new standard for related products in maket, every gadget is well produced as a "intelligent, quality, original and hign-end" one. 

Hot in Global Market
Despite of the gap by language, our surge protector posesses 24 patent rights, this is admirable, right. Now, VINA International Holdings Ltd has stepped into international market such as America, Australia, Germany, Korea and etc. During the past 10 years, VINA International Holdings Ltd has achieved annual growth by 200% on average.

Upgrade to 2.0 Version to Keep in Line with Competitor
Put "original" and "innovation" together, we see chemical change in VINA International Holdings Ltd. Currently, VINA International Holdings Ltd owns a interated production chain, from market analysis to product definition, industry design, market policy, channel sale, mould exploration, electric research, model molding, metal stamping, assembly, warehouse and etc. With annual gross producive exceeds 5 billions, VINA International Holdings Ltd invested 5000,0000 to develop a Internet-orieted industrial park in Dongguan city. This is a landmark event in our development history.
VINA, be classic as always.

Introducing ThunderGo, the most compact and powerful 200W GaN charger. With a trio of  USB-C ports and a USB-A port, this is your best go-to charger. Tired of tangled cables? Frustrated with having not enough power? ThunderGo is your best solution!

 
 Featuring 3 USB-C and 1 USB-A Ports, ThunderGo is the best GaN charger there is on the market, which allows you to simultaneously charge 4 devices at full speed!Have you ever found yourself in the situation where you are desperate to find an adaptor in a foreign country? We got that figured out for you! We offered a set of global pin converters that you can use anywhere in the world. Stay charged has never been easier When it comes to charging, it’s all about safety first! You don’t want to short circuit your devices or even start a fire. ThunderGo is ETL, FC, CE & RoHs certified, which gives absolute safety against overcharging, overcurrent, short circuiting and overheatedYou might have a hard time finding the right charger for your Apple devices, well you don’t have to search for it anymore. ThunderGo is your all-time fit for any Apple devices including iPhone, Macbook, iPad or Airpods!With ThunderGo, save up to 100 USD! Pay less, bring less, charge more! With 2 x 100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 PPS ports, a single 200W ThunderGo charger can charge 2 laptops (16" MacBook Pro) simultaneously, and at full speed. This is a gamechanger in charger technology, making it the one of the first compact chargers around the globe to output 200W. The USB-A port of ThunderGo Charger is compatible with a wide range of devices that support Quick Charge 3.0, AFC, SCP, FCP almost all major fast charging protocols in the market from all major brands including Samsung, Huawei, Oppo, Vivo and Oneplus up to 30W.Weighing just 320g, this is easily one of the most compact devices out there, slip it into your pocket and travel light! No more bulky chargers and messy cables! ThunderGo is literally just the size of a credit card, making it one of the smallest yet powerful charger that satisfies all your charging needs. Having a hard time finding your laptop charging port? story:
Hello friends, Wainlux is back! Last year, with your help, we launched the Wainlux K6 – the first compact, powerful, and simple-to-use laser engraver. The Kickstarter campaign was a great success and helped us reach users all over the world.

By sharing the K6 with so many creative people, we learned a great deal about the features most important to users. Your valuable feedback and suggestions helped guide the development of our latest product – Wainlux L3, the perfect outlet for your creativity.

Small at-home laser machines are not powerful enough to produce your favorite patterns while heavier machines often cost a fortune. You need a slimmed-down industrial laser cutter & engraver, yet with industrial power! Wainlux L3 helps you realize your creative potential at the touch of a button.

  •  Direct Metal Engraving Without Darkening

Engraving on metal is impossible for most laser engravers. But not for Wainlux L3. With twin beams laser + FAC optic, the laser spot is strong enough to engrave on unprepared metal. 

 

 With Wainlux L3, your creative designs come to life thanks to its powerful 10W twin-beam laser. Its versatility is endless – create home decor, gifts for friends, 3D toys, or small businesses you are planning to start in 2021. Anything...as much as you can imagine! 

The Wainlux L3 uses a compressed laser dot of 10W that is powerful enough to cut through a 5mm board in only one pass. It needs fewer passes to cut deeper than other engravers/ cutters in its class, so the resulting kerf is barely larger than the laser beam itself. This makes it possible to make very fine details and leaves less burn on the surface.

 

The body of the L3 is an aluminum structure that is durable and rigid. Left and right linear guide rails ensure the laser head moves synchronously along the x-axis, this means that intricately detailed designs can be reproduced reliably over and over again with perfect accuracy.

 

  • Fast Set-Up

Wainlux L3 has an innovative design that is delivered in pre-assembled modules so it only takes 2 minutes to put them together and begin engraving.

 

 

  • Live Preview

Before you start a masterpiece with L3, you can set it through your mobile or PC on ‘‘Preview Mode’’. There will be a light spot on the object surface moving with the laser head, outlining the size and position of the pattern selected, then the placement can be adjusted as desired.

  • Autofocus by Distance Sensor

It’s frustrating to find ugly burn marks on your work because of lasers that fail to focus. But manually setting the laser focus can be difficult on irregular objects so L3 is designed with an Autofocus feature that finds the ‘sweet spot’ every time. With a simple tap on the touch key on the laser head, it automatically z-downs and stops at the pre-programmed focus distance. Then all you need to do is watch as your design appears on the surface.

 

  • Batch Production

The extended working area of L3 is suitable for engraving larger patterns and also very handy for batch creation-- engraving or cutting several objects at one time without resetting the machine again.

 

  •  Heightening Spacer
     

Make it possible to engrave on a big volume object with 4 heightening columns, less limitation on size, more options to engrave on.

 

  • Rotary Roller 

Cylindrical objects, orbs, even eggs can be engraved on with the rotary roller. 360° engraving is possible for Wainlux L3. Break the rule of conventional engraving, Wainlux L3 brings you more fun engraving on uneven surfaces!

We created L3 by downsizing the high quality and powerful features found in industrial laser cutters & engravers. Wainlux L3 uses a pioneering design that integrates double laser diodes into one head. The converging power beams go through a FAC optic, which compresses the laser into an 80 um spot with output efficiency high up to 97.5%!
 

 

These powerful functions of Wainlux L3 are not to be offered at the cost of your safety. Advanced safeguard gives all-round protections that ensure safety for the device and its users.
 

  •  Review Video By Marco Reps

 

We have been working on our new software and it will be compatible with all of the products from Wainlux (K4 excepted). With cross-platform compatibility for both mobile and desktop use, more intuitive UI design and versatile multi-format support, Wainlux L3 is easier to use for anyone. In addition, Lightburn and LaserGRBL are also compatible with Wainlux L3 after the firmware upgrade.

 

 

  • How To Connect Wainlux L3 To LightBurn & LaserGRBL?
 

*Wainlux L3 is compatible with LightBurn, Click Here to download the right version.

 

*Tutorial video of LaserGRBL  installation

 

 

 

 

 

Xinjia Laser Technology Co., Ltd is a reputable OEM/ ODM provider of various well-known laser equipment companies. By years of practical experience, we have pioneered advances in laser R&D, sales, and supply chain solutions in the industry. Xinjia is the creator and owner of brand Wainlux which successfully launched the  K1, K2, K3, K4, K6 & now L3 series of laser engravers, aiming to offer the best creativity and value-generating solution to users worldwide.

 

  • Wainlux L3 FDA Laser Certificate
  • Wainlux L3 FCC CE-EMC, CE-LVD Certificate
  • Wainlux L3 IEC Test Report
  • Wainlux L3 project demo video demonstrates the complete process of unboxing, assembling, and functioning.
  • Wainlux L3 cuts 6mm wood at one pass only. The video is at its original speed.
  • Wainlux L3 cuts 4mm acrylic at one pass only. The video is at its original speed.

 

  • Wainlux L3 design iteration. 
  • Wainlux R&D team while designing & testing the prototype of L3.
